mapper.sql: select idfollow, member_follower, member_following, access from follow
insert into follow (member_follower, member_following, access) values(#{memberFollower}, #{memberFollowing}, #{access})

select.where:
access = ${access}
AND idfollow = '${idfollow}'
AND member_follower = '${memberFollower}'
AND member_following = '${memberFollowing}'

mapper.select: select count(member_following) as member_following from `coco`.`follow` where member_follower = #{value}
select count(member_follower) as member_follower from `coco`.`follow` where member_following = #{value}

delete.where:
access = ${access}
AND idfollow = '%${idfollow}%'
AND member_follower = '${memberFollower}'
AND member_following = '${memberFollowing}'
